main.title: Projects Portfolio
main.description: A showcase of my development work and technical projects

projects.name: AI-Powered Customer Analytics Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive machine learning platform that analyzes customer behavior patterns and provides actionable insights for business growth. This platform integrates multiple data sources to create detailed customer profiles and predict future behaviors.

projects.name: E-Commerce Mobile Application
projects.description: Full-featured mobile e-commerce application with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.name: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: Scalable real-time messaging application supporting group chats, file sharing, and emoji reactions with end-to-end encryption.

projects.name: Blockchain Voting System
projects.description: Secure and transparent voting system built on blockchain technology ensuring vote integrity and immutability.

projects.name: IoT Smart Home Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive IoT dashboard for smart home management with lighting, temperature, and security system controls.

projects.name: Machine Learning Stock Predictor
projects.description: Advanced stock price prediction system using LSTM neural networks with 85% accuracy rate for trading signals.

projects.name: Cloud Infrastructure Automation
projects.description: DevOps automation suite for cloud infrastructure management with CI/CD pipelines and auto-scaling capabilities.

projects.name: Augmented Reality Shopping App
projects.description: AR-powered shopping experience allowing customers to visualize products in their space before purchase.

projects.name: Microservices API Gateway
projects.description: High-performance API gateway for microservices architecture handling 10k+ requests per second with load balancing.

projects.name: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive business intelligence dashboard with real-time data visualization and automated report generation.

projects.name: Cybersecurity Threat Detection
projects.description: AI-powered cybersecurity system for threat detection and response using machine learning to identify anomalies.

projects.name: Progressive Web Application
projects.description: High-performance PWA with offline capabilities, push notifications, and native app-like experience.
